SELECT
A.USER_IDX AS userIdx, A.PSN_NM AS psnNm, A.USER_TP AS userTp, A.GENDER_TYPE_CD AS genderTypeCd , A.FRGN_YN AS frgnYn , A.USER_ID AS userId , A.PASSWORD AS password , A.EMAIL AS email , A.EMAIL_RECV_YN AS emailRecvYn , A.ZIPCD AS zipcd , A.ADDR1 AS addr1 , A.ADDR2 AS addr2 , A.TEL_NO AS telNo , A.CP_NO AS cpNo , A.FAX_NO AS faxNo , A.DEPT_NM AS deptNm , A.POSITION_NM AS positionNm , A.USER_TYPE_CD AS userTypeCd , A.BIRTH_DATE AS birthDate , A.DELETE_YN AS deleteYn , A.ORG_GRP_CD AS orgGrpCd , A.AUTH_LV AS authLv , A.REG_DT AS regDt , A.REG_IP AS regIp , A.REG_IDX AS regIdx , A.UP_DT AS upDt , A.UP_IP AS upIp , A.UP_IDX AS upIdx , A.USER_APP_STATE AS userAppState , A.REJECT AS reject , A.PRO_STATE AS proState, C.ORG_ADDR1 AS orgAddr1, C.ORG_ADDR2 AS orgAddr2, C.ORG_ZIPCODE AS orgZipCode, C.ORG_PHONE AS orgPhone, C.ORG_FAX AS orgFax
FROM TB_USER_COPY AS A LEFT JOIN TB_ORG_GRP_SUB AS C ON A.DEPT_NM = C.ORG_GRP_SUB_NM
WHERE 1 = 1 AND (DELETE_YN != 'Y' or DELETE_YN IS NULL) AND LOWER(USER_ID) = LOWER(#{userId}) AND PASSWORD = #{userPwd}

SELECT C.MODULE_INFO_IDX, C.AUTH_LIST, C.AUTH_EDIT, C.AUTH_DEL, C.AUTH_WRITE, C.AUTH_CMT, C.AUTH_REPLY
FROM TB_USER_COPY A
LEFT JOIN TB_AUTH_ORG_USER_REL B ON (A.USER_IDX = B.USER_IDX)
LEFT JOIN TB_AUTH_ORG_USER_MODULE C ON (B.ORG_GRP_AUTH_CD = C.ORG_GRP_AUTH_CD AND B.ORG_GRP_CD = C.ORG_GRP_CD)
WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
